title: Expanding Cards
description: With this project we will create a pop-up card that shows an enlarged view of the card when clicking

title: Progress Steps
description: With this project we will make a step of progress, which are very interesting

title: Rotating Navigation
description: With this projects we will learn to use a click event and an arrow function, to open and close a menu

title: Hidden Search
description: With this project we will learn to make a search bar that when clicking is displayed

title: Blurry Loading
description: With this project you will see a distorted image that will become sharp as the load progresses

title: Dad Jokes
description: With this project we created a joke generator by consuming the icanhazdadjoke API, which sends us a random joke every time we call the API

title: Sound Board
description: With this project we created a board with several buttons that when you click it, a different sound sounds

title: Live User Filter
description: With this project we create a filter where we can find a user by name or by location, for this we will use data from the Random User Generator API

title: Button Ripple Effect
description: With this project we create a button that when clicking it generates a visual effect

title: Background Slider
description: With this project we create an image carousel where the background image also changes

title: Kinetic Loader
description: With this project we will learn to make a spinner with pure CSS by using frames

title: Netflix Navigation
description: With this project we will create a menu that will be displayed by touching a button

title: Testimonial Box
description: With this project we want to make a card that shows information from a list of objects

title: Pokedex
description: With this project we will create a list of pokemon cards. The information is extracted from an API

title: Double Click Heart
description: With this project we will create a card that when we double click on the image a heart will come out

title: Event KeyCodes
description: With this proyecto we are going to identify by an event, which key is pressed on the keyboard. and the information to the pressed key will be printed on the screen

title: Mobile Tab Navigation
description: With this project we are going to identify by an event, which icon is pressed in the design. And the information from the pressed icon, in this case an image, will be printed on the layout

title: Drink Water
description: With this project we will carry out a process of filling a bottle

title: Feedback UI Design
description: With this project we are going to measure user satisfaction. There are 3 states to measure 'satisfaction'. And when pressing the submit button, it will show what status was selected and a message

title: Github Profiles
description: With this project using input, we are going to ask for a username from github, and by pressing 'enter', we will print the basic information of the user, using the github api
